duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide high-quality patient care in acute care settings, including emergency departments, critical care units, and medical-surgical floors.
Utilize critical thinking and quick decision-making to respond to emergency situations and complex patient needs.
Administer medications and treatments according to physician orders and established protocols.
Demonstrate compassion, empathy, and understanding while interacting with patients and their families.
Utilize strong clinical skills to assess, diagnose, and develop care plans for patients with diverse medical needs.
Collaborate with interdisciplinary teams to ensure comprehensive and effective patient care.
Maintain attention to detail in documenting patient assessments, interventions, and outcomes.
Adapt to changing circumstances and patient conditions to provide safe and effective care.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Nursing (Master's degree preferred)
Active Registered Nurse (RN) license in the state of practice
